long_description: After an afternoon snowshoeing in tights, zip on the Isis Carlotta Dress and head to the lodge restaurant. You'll love the stretchy soft-shell fabric and stylish looks. Soft-shell fabric offers excellent 4-way stretch and breathability; durable water repellent finish beads up moisture. High collar with snap closures keeps your neck warm. Ergonomic cut-away at the back of neck allows full range of motion. Isis Carlotta Dress has a double pocket design, with slide-in and zippered hand pockets. Closeout.
short_description: After an afternoon snowshoeing in tights, zip on the Isis Carlotta Dress and head to the lodge restaurant. You'll love the stretchy soft-shell fabric and stylish looks.
